c74object.name: fl.multitaper~
c74object.digest: Calculates the multitaper power spectrum of a real input using the cosine tapers.
c74object.description: All FFTs performed will use a power of two size. Output frames will be (N / 2) + 1 in length where N is the FFT size. Inputs which are not a power of two are zero-padded to the next power of two.

entry.name: 0. /maxlength [instantiation int]
entry.description: Sets the maximum input length / FFT size.

entry.name: 1. /numtapers [int]
entry.description: Sets the number of tapers to use.
